formulas.name: formulaServiceRecordType
formulas.expression: CASE({!Each_opp_product.Product2.Type__c}, "Website Launches", {!$Label.ID_Service_Website_Launches}, "General", {!$Label.ID_Service_SEO_General}, "Content Review", {!$Label.ID_Service_Content_Review}, "Paid Media", {!$Label.ID_Service_Paid_Media}, "SEO Key Word Analysis", {!$Label.ID_Service_SEO_KWA}, "Social Media", {!$Label.ID_Service_Social_Media}, "MLS Implementation", {!$Label.ID_Service_MLS_Implementation}, "SEO Migration", {!$Label.ID_Service_SEO_Migration}, "Platform Migration", {!$Label.ID_Service_Platform_Migration}, "Property Website", {!$Label.ID_Service_Property_Website}, "Design Refresh", {!$Label.ID_Service_Design_Refresh}, "Design Change", "0125f000000VvKAAA0", "GMB Posts","0125f000000VvKCAA0" , "SEO Optimizations",{!$Label.ID_Service_SEO_Optmizations}, "Blogs",{!$Label.ID_Service_Blogs}, "Agent Subdomains", {!$Label.ID_Service_Agent_Subdomains}, "Monthly and Quarterly Reporting" , {!$Label.ID_Service_Monthly_Quarterly_Reporting}, "On-Demand Ads", {!$Label.ID_Service_OnDemand_Ads}, "GBP SetUp", {!$Label.ID_Service_GBP_Set_Up}, "Custom Website", {!$Label.ID_Service_Custom_Website}, "Presence Copilot", {!$Label.ID_Service_Presence_Copilot}, "AI Lead Nurture", {!$Label.ID_Service_AI_Lead_Nurture}, "Automated Blogs", {!$Label.ID_Service_Automated_Blogs}, "AI Lead Nurture", {!$Label.ID_Service_AI_Lead_Nurture}, "White Label App", {!$Label.ID_Service_White_Label_App}, "QBR", {!$Label.ID_Service_QBR}, {!$Label.ID_Service_SEO_General})

formulas.name: forStatus
formulas.expression: CASE({!Each_opp_product.Product2.Type__c}, "Website Launches", "New", "General", "New", "Paid Media", "New", "SEO Key Word Analysis", "New", "Social Media", "New", "MLS Implementation", "New", "SEO Migration", "New", "Platform Migration", "Pre-Build IM Review", "Property Website", "New", "Design Refresh", "New", "GBP Posts","New", "SEO Optimizations","New", "Blogs","New", "Agent Subdomains", "Waiting on Brand Website", "Monthly and Quarterly Reporting" , "New", "On-Demand Ads", "New", "GBP SetUp", "New", "AI Lead Nurture", "New", "QBR", "New", "New")
